articles.title: UFC 305 takeaways: Du Plessis continues impressive tear; Adesanya's future is unclear
articles.description: Dricus du Plessis cleared a major hurdle in legitimizing his reign as middleweight champion at UFC 305.
articles.content:
Aug 18, 2024, 02:15 AM ET
A 12-fight card at UFC 305 in Perth, Western Australia, was headlined by a middleweight title matchup between Dricus Du Plessis and Israel Adesanya. While Du Plessis retain… [+7600 chars]

articles.title: Possible U-Turn On Retirement? Vinesh Phogat Says "Don't Know If..."

articles.author: Adam Minter
articles.title: Gymnastics deserves better judges
articles.description: Jordan Chiles had her bronze medal revoked at Paris 2024 due to judging mistakes and bureaucratic failures. This incident marred Team USA's success and raised concerns about gymnastics' scoring system. Since the 1970s, the sport has struggled with accusations…
articles.content: The International Olympic Committee may have stripped Jordan Chiles of the bronze medal she won at Paris 2024, but she won it fairly. Judging errors and administrative incompetence are to blame. And … [+3842 chars]
